sentences.en: ...the kind of unctuous tone that I've heard often at diplomatic parties.
sentences.cn: ...我在外交聚会上经常听到的那种虚情假意的腔调。

sentences.en: Far from being unctuous Pat was always loath to appear acquiescent.
sentences.cn: 由于并不愿意假意奉承,所以帕特总是不愿意表现出勉强顺从的姿态.

sentences.en: General Pecken roused himself after a moment with an unctuous and benignant smile.
sentences.cn: 过了一会,佩克姆将军装出一副和蔼可亲的神情微微一笑,又活跃起来了.

sentences.en: Goose fat gives the most unctuous flavour but you can use chicken fat.
sentences.cn: 鹅油最肥美，不过你也可以用鸡油。
他做了个虚请假意的承诺.
她那虚情假意的语气叫人恶心.

sentences.en: It was unctuous, false, and unwholesome, like the man.
sentences.cn: 他的口气是油滑的, 虚伪的, 讨厌的, 就象他那个人.

sentences.en: Palate Unctuous and dense, with the pear , floral and orange flavours riding a keen acidity.
sentences.cn: 口感:顺滑、浓醇, 溢满梨子 、 橙子及花的芳香,酸度适中.

sentences.en: Unctuous but vivacious in the mouth.
sentences.cn: 口感醇浓而又不乏轻快.

sentences.en: Unctuous ripe red fruit aromas intermingle with hints of freshly ground coffee beans and mocha.
sentences.cn: 可塑性的成熟红水果的芳香混合了新鲜咖啡豆和摩卡咖啡的香味,令人陶醉.

sentences.en: Unctuous. Term applied to wines which are smooth, soft and full on the palate.
sentences.cn: 肥厚的、丰满的: 用于描述口感平顺 、 柔和、饱满的葡萄酒.

words.tran_cn: [食品]油质的；虚情假意的；油腔滑调的

trans.tran_cn: 油的，油膏的，似油的，松软肥沃的
trans.tran_en: If you describe food or drink as unctuous, you mean that it is creamy or oily
